fn.p: The authors declare no competing financial interests.

Author Contributions C. Q. Tang designed the research, conducted the fieldwork and wrote the manuscript. J. López-Pujol built the models, analyzed the distribution of Davidia involucrata under four different time points, and improved the writing. Y.-F. Dong, L.-Y. He, M.-C. Peng conducted the fieldwork and analyzed the field data. S. Herrando-Moraira produced the maps and calculated the distribution areas of D. involucrata. T. Matsui and H. Ohashi performed further analysis on the model’s validations. K. Nakao, N. Tanaka, M. Tomita, X.-S. Li, H.-Z. Yan, J. Hu, R.-H. Yang, W.-J. Li, K. Yan, X. Hou, Z.-Y. Zhang discussed the results and improved the data presentation. All authors revised the manuscript.
